title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Communications, Climate Action and
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Communications, Climate Action and 
Environment (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited communication climate action environment (alteration name department title minister) order

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: (2) This Order comes into operation on 24 September 2020.
text_raw:
2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 24 September 2020.

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Cumarsáide, Gníomhaithe ar son na hAeráide agus 
Comhshaoil and, in the English language, the Department of Communications, 
Climate Action and Environment, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an 
Roinn Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide and, in the English language, to 
that of the Department of the Environment, Climate and Communications.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn cumarsaide gniomhaithe ar son na haeraide agus comhshaoil english language department communication climate action environment altered irish language roinn comhshaoil aeraide agus cumarsaide english language department environment climate communication

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Cumarsáide, Gníomhaithe ar son 
na hAeráide agus Comhshaoil and, in the English language, the Minister for 
Communications, Climate Action and Environment, is altered, in the Irish 
language, to that of an tAire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide and, in the 
English language, to that of the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire cumarsaide gniomhaithe ar son na haeraide agus comhshaoil english language minister communication climate action environment altered irish language taire comhshaoil aeraide agus cumarsaide english language minister environment climate communication

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Communications, Climate Action 
and Environment shall be construed as references to the 
Department of the Environment, Climate and Communications; 

references to the Minister for Communications, Climate Action 
and Environment shall be construed as references to the Minister 
for the Environment, Climate and Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [373] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
